alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 09 at 3:12AM PST until March 10 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY FOR THE BASE OF THE NORTHERN BLUE MOUNTAINS OF OREGON... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected for the base of the northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...From 3 PM Thursday to 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
